summary.para: Main aim of this document is to guide throw the software and documentation development acording to selected criteria.

introduction.para: This help file is to provid comprehensive description of:

listItem.para: the selected authoring and documentation generating tools.
deployment of the selected help formats.

introduction.para: Additionaly this documentation can be treated as an example of procedures, source formats, integration methods, etc. It is outcome of two projects:

listItem.para: VS 2008 - usded as a set of authoring tools for developing .html, xsd, .maml (xml) files
SHFB project - documentation generating environment used to configure and run all of the applications reuired to generate selected file format.

content.para: This VS project contains links to MAML and HTML files included in the SHFB project. The main reason is to get the IntelliSense support while editing the files. The .XML file conforms to maml standard and are linked with the maml schema. There are some incosistency between the SandCastle schemas and VS schemas that have to be fixed with a few manual updates.

This project folder contains a configuration file that can be used by the GUI to develope and build the project. This project file is also used by a script to build documentation from the command line as a part of the software build process.
The project contains also all the content files in the HTML (AddContent folder) and MAML (Content folder) formats. Files included in the build are selected using the GUI.
